ygData.subject: RE: Blackened Iron Armor *SPOILER* (sort of)
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, I tend to die about 2-3 times a day, if I m lucky - but less so now because I m playing an SK and I get my I wanna grunt, tank and beat the crap outta
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, I tend to die about 2-3 times a day, if I'm lucky - but less so now
because I'm playing an SK and I get my "I wanna grunt, tank and beat the
crap outta monsters" desires out of my system playing him. Now my Bard is
handled in a more subtle manner, as they should be. (Even though I do
believe we're still pretty good damage-dishers (?)).

Dud

-----Original Message-----
From: RON_TALBOT@...
[SMTP:RON_TALBOT@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 4:41 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Blackened Iron Armor *SPOILER* (sort of)

From: RON_TALBOT@...

I die on average of 2 or 3
times a level. (can you say reckless? That guy in 'Lethal Weapon' is
my hero... :) )


______________________________ Reply Separator
_________________________________
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Blackened Iron Armor *SPOILER* (sort of)
Author: Non-HP-fun-bob (fun-bob@...) at HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
Date: 7/21/99 1:29 PM


From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>

Umm....I dont think Dagnors Cauldron Aqua Goblins are a real good choice
for
a level 15....I'm 17, and the lowliest gobs there just started con'ing blue
to me at this level...

-----Original Message-----
From: RON_TALBOT@...
<RON_TALBOT@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 2:44 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Blackened Iron Armor *SPOILER* (sort of)


>From: RON_TALBOT@...
>
>
> 15 is an awkward level. You can always hunt Wisps and zombies on
wisp
>island, (between eurdin and Qeynos) good money but minimal exp at 15. I
>financed my set of banded and my dirk that way. Gnoll Reavers south of
the
>bridge in East Karana have good loot but the Velcro wolves make this a bit
>dangerous. Take a group of three or four depending on level. On the
other
side
>of the world you might try the Aqua goblins in Dagor's Cauldron, they have
>pretty good loot, just avoid the Lords. There is always crushbone and
unrest
>but these areas are very crowded.
>
>Good Hunting,
>Bujold, 18th chorus
>Xwgony
>
>______________________________ Reply Separator
_________________________________

>
>
>From: "Michal Hobson" <given@...>
>
>> Message to all the Players over 30th level who have over a 1000p in bank
>and
>> nothing to spend it on:
>>
>> I am not Proud
>
>I second that! By the way, one more time for the record. Where can I
fight
>at lvl 15,get good loot and not die? I'm so poor, I have yet to buy my
lvl
>11, 14, and 15 songs. I am so poor that in order to make extra cash to
>build up my smithing skill, I fish. On the other hand, my fishing is 50
>now. How you measure fishing skill I don't know, but I am AVERAGE in
>fishing!
>
>Weiland of FREEPORT
>EROLLISI MARR
>always on at around 10 pm CST (hint, hint)
>will respond to any tells and come running to grovel for donations when
>offered (another hint)
>I do not mind being handed cash or sellable items but I won't use a given
>item (unless its really nice, i.e. troll hide belt, blackened iron crown)
>unless I've done something for it. (big hint)
>
